source_name: LCA of Danish Fish Products. New methods and insights
source_documentation:
Based on M. Thrane PhD thesis, http://www.armeris.fr/downloads/fuel/Thrane_2004_1.pdf
See also: 10.1162/1088198041269427

effort_models.name: Fuel Economy - Landed Catch - Danish Beam Trawl
effort_models.documentation:
2.5 litres diesel per kg flatfish [Thrane 2006, doi 10.1065/lca2006.01.232, Fig. 5]
 at 35 MJ/l* 1 kWh/3.6MJ at 40% engine efficiency = about 10 kW*h per kg

effort_models.name: Fuel Economy - Landed Catch - Danish Bottom Trawl
effort_models.documentation:
1.0 litres diesel per kg flatfish [Thrane 2006, doi 10.1065/lca2006.01.232, Fig. 5]
 at 35 MJ/l* 1 kWh/3.6MJ at 40% engine efficiency = about 4 kW*h per kg

effort_models.name: Fuel Economy - Landed Catch - Danish Seine
effort_models.documentation:
0.16 litres diesel per kg flatfish [Thrane 2006, doi 10.1065/lca2006.01.232, Fig. 5]
 at 35 MJ/l* 1 kWh/3.6MJ at 40% engine efficiency = about 0.62 kW*h per kg
